title: Kenya Cuts Gasoline Pump Prices by 2.3% From Feb. 15
description: Kenya’s price for super petrol will be reduced by four shillings and 24 cents per liter to 178.26 shillings in the capital, Nairobi, the Energy and Petroleum Regulatory Authority said in a statement on X.
